title: Constructivist-Based Technology-Enhanced Teaching Method Design for African Teacher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Educational Theories and Digital Device Usage Experience
context.additional_context: Hybrid lesson design reflecting non-traditional teacher training experiences in Africa, with a focus on modeling interaction-centered instruction using digital technology

learning_goals: Learners can design interactive lessons using digital tools by applying constructivist theory.
Learners can develop technology-based instructional materials suitable for African educational environments and apply them in classrooms.
Learners can analyze interactive class implementation cases and derive improvement points through peer assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
